query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
1 Mentre che li occhi per la fronda verde 2 ficcava ïo sì come far suole 3 chi dietro a li uccellin sua vita perde,
query.error: **English:** 1 While I was gazing through the verdant leaves, 2 as one is wont to do who loses his life 3 following the birds,
query.result: 1 Travia ha’m lagasa bys y foyl gwer, 2 kepar ha gwella den a golla 3 ow kul an edhon y’n bys,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
4 lo più che padre mi dicea: «Figliuole, 5 vienne oramai, ché ’l tempo che n’è imposto 6 più utilmente compartir si vuole».
query.error: **English:** 4 my father said to me: «My son, 5 come now, for the time allotted to us 6 should be spent more usefully».
query.result: 4 hemma a leveris: «Fy mernans, 5 dos ow bys, rag an amser a-ugh dhyn 6 a wra dhe wrussa moy efan».

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
7 Io volsi ’l viso, e ’l passo non men tosto, 8 appresso i savi, che parlavan sìe, 9 che l’andar mi facean di nullo costo.
query.error: **English:** 7 I turned my face, and my steps no less swiftly, 8 following the wise men, who spoke in such a way 9 that their words made my journey seem effortless.
query.result: 7 Y trohas ow holan, ha’m passow nans mar, 8 wosa an furvow, ow tos o komprehendya, 9 ow holan ow journey heb kost mar.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
10 Ed ecco piangere e cantar s’udìe 11 ‘Labïa mëa, Domine’ per modo 12 tal, che diletto e doglia parturìe.
query.error: **English:** 10 And suddenly a sound of weeping and singing 11 was heard: ‘Labia mea, Domine’ in such a way 12 that it produced both delight and sorrow.
query.result: 10 Ha’n termyn, kanen ha kanow o klevys, 11 ‘Labia mea, Domine’ yn fordh 12 ow tos pleser ha dolur dhe dhiskwedhes.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
13 «O dolce padre, che è quel ch’i’ odo?», 14 comincia’ io; ed elli: «Ombre che vanno 15 forse di lor dover solvendo il nodo».
query.error: **English:** 13 «O sweet father, what is it that I hear?», 14 I began; and he: «Shades who go, 15 perhaps absolving themselves of their duty».
query.result: 13 «O tas dhoal, pyth yw henna ow klevon?», 14 ow komprehendya; ha henna: «Skodhow ow tos 15 mes a-dhiskarga aga dlever».

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
16 Sì come i peregrin pensosi fanno, 17 giugnendo per cammin gente non nota, 18 che si volgono ad essa e non restanno,

query.result: 16 Kepar ha pererinow treusow a wra, 17 ow tressa dhe’n fordh le mayth yw anserghek, 18 ow tos troha dhe aga holan heb lettya,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
19 così di retro a noi, più tosto mota, 20 venendo e trapassando ci ammirava 21 d’anime turba tacita e devota.

query.result: 19 hemma yn aga holan, moy tosta, 20 ow tos ow holan ha tremenya, ow tos aga holan 21 bagas a enevalow heb gerens ha devos.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
22 Ne li occhi era ciascuna oscura e cava, 23 palida ne la faccia, e tanto scema 24 che da l’ossa la pelle s’informava.
query.error: **English:** 22 In their eyes each one was dark and hollow, 23 pale in the face, and so thin 24 that the skin clung to their bones.
query.result: 22 Yn aga lagasa oedh pub onn tewl ha kav, 23 pal dhe glas yn aga hys, ha kemmys 24 ow tos an kroc ow tos an golen ow forma.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
25 Non credo che così a buccia strema 26 Erisittone fosse fatto secco, 27 per digiunar, quando più n’ebbe tema.
query.error: **English:** 25 I do not believe that Erysichthon 26 became so thin and wasted, 27 through fasting, when he most feared it.
query.result: 25 Nyns krevya henna dhevel orth Erisithon 26 ow tos dhe wruthylla kemmys, 27 rag yeyn, pan oedh moy ow tamya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.

query.result: 28 Me a leveris dhe'm honan: ‘Sel, 29 an bobel a gollas an Jerusalem, 30 pan roos Mari dhodha dhodh dhe'n Mab!’

query.prompt:

query.result: 31 Yth esa'ga'n lagadow kelster heb gemmow: 32 neb a lenn yn edhom dhe'n den ‘den’ 33 a via konvedhys an ‘M’ ama.
